title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: Reproduce the steps in: 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default new basic project new file test.xml the editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which totally ignores the XML file content. Select test.xml in Navigator and choose Open With... / Default Text Editor. The expected behavior is that a new editor should open on the file because the editor type is different. However, nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is reactivated instead.
EB: When selecting test.xml in Navigator and choosing Open With... / Default Text Editor, a new editor should open on the file, taking into consideration the different editor type. The scripted resource editor should not be reactivated.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
4. Choose Open With... / Default Text Editor.
5. Verify that a new editor opens on the file, considering the different editor type.
